Just download the klite codec pack for free from codecguide.com and it updates windows media player to play all video types. I have not found a video on this site that doesnt play with the media player.

This film seems to be in a mix of ocassional French subtitles in the film, and spoken Polish, Russian, and American English.  I'm sure it was for dramatic effect, but it makes it almost unwatchable without subtitles in your language, which are absent.

Quality and sound is good.  Sound doesn't begin until National Geographic logo pops up in the beginning, so skip forward to check that sound is workign
